sentences.sContent: Overly proud people refuse to admit their mistakes — and sometimes even deny the fact that they make them — because they feel that it would impugn their image.
sentences.sContent_eng: Overly proud people refuse to admit their mistakes — and sometimes even deny the fact that they make them — because they feel that it would impugn their image.
sentences.sCn: 过于自负的人拒绝承认自己的错误 — 甚至有时候否认自己制造错误的事实 — 因为他们感觉那将会打击到自己的形象。

remMethod.val: im(进入) + pugn(打斗) → 马上就要进入打斗状态 → 提出异议
